profile.type

Class Router

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.profile.AProfile
      • core.profile.AStructuredProfile
        • profile.type.Router
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IProfile

    public class Router
extends AStructuredProfile
    This is a Router. This is where much of the security is enforced across the network. I've tried to split it out as much as possible! If you want to make changes in here, you'll have a lot of reading to do :)!

      protected java.util.Set<IUnit> getInstalled()

      protected java.util.Set<IUnit> getLiveConfig()
      This is Units for configurations you expect to change regularly, e.g.
      protected java.util.Set<IUnit> getPersistentConfig()
      Expecting the configuration to change regularly? Put it in AStructuredProfile.getLiveConfig()!
      java.util.Set<IUnit> getPersistentFirewall()
      You almost certainly mean AStructuredProfile.getLiveFirewall().

      • getPersistentFirewall

        public java.util.Set<IUnit> getPersistentFirewall()
        Description copied from class: AStructuredProfile
        You almost certainly mean AStructuredProfile.getLiveFirewall(). Please put Units related to the persistent configuration of the firewall (e.g. adding a Device) here.
